title: Projectile motion - expression for final speed

content.question: A ball is projected horizontally from a table with height <math alttext="H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>H</mi></math> above the ground. The ball lands after a time <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, hitting the ground a horizontal distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> away from the edge of the table, as shown. Which of the following is a correct expression for the instantaneous speed of the ball immediately before it reaches the ground?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator D, and denominator t sub 1, close parenthesis, squared, plus, open parenthesis, g times t sub 1, close parenthesis, squared, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator D squared, and denominator 2 g times t sub 1, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator H, and denominator t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>H</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator D, and denominator t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator D, and denominator t sub 1, close parenthesis, squared, plus, open parenthesis, g times t sub 1, close parenthesis, squared, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.5: Vectors and Motion in Two Dimensions

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
